HC Train 919 Delayed
HC  train #919, scheduled to arrive Joliet at 6:36 PM, may be operating 20 to 25 minutes behind schedule due to freight train interference . Visit MetraTracker.com for the location of your train.

ME Hazel Crest elevator is out of service.
The Hazel Crest elevator is out of service. Customers can use Calumet or Harvey as alternate boarding stations. Updates will be provided.

MED Train 224 Is On The Move
Inbound train #224, scheduled to depart Blue Island at 5:35 PM, is on the move and may be operating 35 to 40 minutes behind schedule due to an earlier vehicle stuck on the tracks. Updated 6:10PM

ME The Millennium Station Michigan Avenue Elevator is Permanently Out of Service
The Millennium Station Michigan Avenue elevator is permanently out of service. Customers can use the South Water elevator or Museum Campus elevator as alternate boarding stations.

ME Van Buren Michigan Street Station elevator is out of service.
The Van Buren Michigan Street Station elevator is out of service. Customers can use Millennium Station South Water or Museum Campus as alternate boarding stations. Updates will be provided.

Metra Alert ME - Track Construction on Sunday, March 16

Track construction will be taking place on Sunday, March 16. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 30 minutes behind schedule passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes. For additional information visit metra.com/constructionnotices.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert MD-N - Track Construction on Sunday, March 16

Track construction will be taking place on Sunday, March 16. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 20 minutes behind schedule passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes. For additional information visit metra.com/constructionnotices.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert UP-N - Track Construction Saturday, March 15 through Sunday, March 16

Track construction will be taking place on Saturday, March 15 through Sunday, March 16. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 25 minutes behind schedule passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes. For additional information visit metra.com/constructionnotices.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME - 87th street/Woodruff Station Closure Beginning December 16 - Station Rebuild Project

The 87th street/Woodruff station on the Metra Electric line will be closed beginning Monday, December 16. During this time passengers can use 83rd and 91st street stations as alternatives. This is part of the Metra Electric Community initiative to transform multiple stations on the Metra Electric District. Once completed, the station will have an enclosed ADA-accessible street-level entrance, lobby with an elevator, new stairs, headhouses, new composite deck platforms, new lighting, and signage. The station is expected to reopen in late 2025. For more information visit metra.com.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME - 79th Street/Chatham Station
The 79th Street/Chatham station on the Metra Electric may not be fully ADA accessible Monday through Friday from 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME - The 95th St/Chicago State University station will close March 3, 2025 - Station Rehab and Expansion Project

On Monday, March 3, the 95th st/Chicago State University station will close for approximately 2 years to undergo a rehabilitation and expansion project. During this time passengers should use 91st street and 103rd st/Rosemoor stations as alternates. Updates will be provided.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME -  103rd St./Rosemoor Station ADA Accessibility.
Monday through Friday, from 9AM to 4PM, the 103rd St,/Rosemoor station may not be fully ADA accessible due to nearby station construction.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert MD-N - Fox Lake Station Platform Closure

Attention Fox Lake Station passengers: The north end of the Fox Lake platform and a section of the north parking lot will be closed until further notice for construction at the depot. Trains will load and unload from the south end of the platform.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert -  Metra St. Patrick's Day Service and Alcohol Restrictions.

Metra is providing extra service, including some express trains, on seven of its 11 lines, on Saturday, March 15 for the Chicago St. Patrick’s Day Parade. On Sunday, March 16, Metra is providing extra service on its Rock Island Line   for the 46th Annual South Side Irish Parade.

For Saturday’s events, Metra will offer extra trains on its BNSF, Milwaukee District North, Milwaukee District West, Rock Island, Union Pacific North, Union Pacific Northwest, and Union Pacific West lines. This includes early morning trains so you can have plenty of time to watch them dye the Chicago River green.

Alcohol is banned on all Metra trains on Saturday, March 15 and on all Rock Island Line trains on Sunday, March 16. Metra also advises cyclists that trains are expected to be crowded all weekend and there may not be room for bicycles on the trains. Details about train service for both events are available at metra.com
